statements: DELETE FROM media_coverage_tracking WHERE media_source = 'News Channel A';
DELETE FROM media_coverage_tracking WHERE topic_id = 1 AND media_source = 'CNN';
DELETE FROM media_coverage_tracking WHERE number_of_mentions > 100 AND sentiment_analysis = 'Positive';
DELETE FROM media_mentions WHERE mention_id = 5 AND topic_id = 3;
DELETE FROM media_mentions WHERE mention_date < '2022-01-01' AND sentiment = 'Negative';
DELETE FROM social_media_mentions WHERE platform = 'Twitter' AND sentiment = 'Positive';
